attributes.action: Improve the health of all UK citizens by abolishing the use of mercury in all dental fillings from 2008 as outlined in the bill H.R.4011 currently before the US congress
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Evidence is being found on a regular basis that mercury is released from dental fillings during chewing, drinking and to a lesser degree during breathing.   Mercury is a very toxic substance and it has been implicated in the cause of Arthritis, Lupus, MS, ME, Dementia (PSP, Alzheimer's & Parkinsons).   No suitable treatment is available for these conditions and many other countries have already banned its use to improve the health of their citizens.  Cremation of bodies with amalgam fillings damages the environment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
